custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user is watching VOD/SVOD content
AND the controls are displayed
AND no user interaction has occurred for several seconds
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the controls will be hidden

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user is watching VOD/SVOD content
AND the controls are displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the scrubber is visible

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user is watching VOD/SVOD content
AND the controls are displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN media title is visible

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the controls are displayed
AND the user is not scrubbing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN media time is visible

title: VOD//SVOD- Closed Captions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user viewing VOD/SVOD content

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the controls are displayed
AND CC is available
AND the user is not scrubbing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN show a CC Button

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the controls are visible
AND the CC button is in focus
AND CC is currently OFF
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN CC OFF displays

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the controls are visible
AND the CC button is in focus
AND CC is currently ON
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN CC ON displays

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN controls are shown 
AND CC ON/OFF is actioned
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN activate/deactivate Closed Captioning

title: VOD/SVOD- FF/RW/Play/Pause
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching VOD/SVOD content

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN PLAY/PAUSE are actioned
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Play or Pause icon temporarily appears on the screen and then disappears after a few seconds

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN  RF/FF are actioned
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the media time appears above the scrubber
AND the speed multiplier of FF/RW is displayed below the scrubber

title: SLIVE media context
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user

  
NOTE: Mark this test case as blocked if no FLIVE (Free Live) or SLIVE (Subscriber Live) VOD/SVOD (non-game) content is available for playback

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user starts SLIVE/FLIVE content
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN content will start at the live point

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user views an SLIVE/FLIVE feed
AND the controls are visible
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN FF / RW options are not available
THEN user can PLAY / PAUSE video

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user views an SLIVE/FLIVE feed
AND the controls are visible
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a LIVE indicator will be visible instead of a static time

title: Screensaver settings
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a VOD/SVOD (must be longer than length of device timeout)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the device screensaver timeout occurs
AND the stream is playing
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the clip continues to play
AND the screensaver is not activated

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the device screensaver timeout occurs
AND the stream is paused
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the screensaver can be  activated according to device settings

title: VOD/SVOD autoplay- Play next
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user playing VOD/SVOD content
AND next media exists

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN media is within the last 10 seconds
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN display thumbnail of next content

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN thumbnail is displayed 
AND the user does not have focus on the scrubber
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN thumbnail should receive focus

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN thumbnail is displayed 
AND the user has focus on the scrubber
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN thumbnail should not receive focus

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN thumbnail is not in focus
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user can navigate to the thumbnail

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN thumbnail is actioned
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the next video should be started

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN thumbnail is not actioned
AND the video has completed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the next video should be started

title: VOD/SVOD autoplay- Last item in playlist
custom_preconds: GIVEN the last element in a playlist is playing
custom_steps:
WHEN  there is no upcoming element
AND the video has completed

title: VOD/SVOD autoplay- Live  clip in playlist
custom_preconds:
GIVEN next media exists 
AND the next media is live
(mark as blocked if no live media exists in the carousels at time of testing and make a note in the comments indicating this)
custom_steps:
WHEN the current media is VOD/SVOD
AND the video has completed
custom_expected: THEN the live media begins and the FF/RW/pause abilities should be removed

title: Playback failure (Charles required)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user attempts to play back VOD/SVOD content
AND video playback fails (this can be simulated by blocking calls to https://mlb-cuts-diamond.mlb.com:443/*?* for VOD content and blocking calls to https://svod-fst.mlb.com:443/*?* for SVOD content)
custom_expected: THEN then a playback error should be shown to the user

title: Authorization failure (Charles required)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user attempts to play SVOD content (Subscriber Video on Demand (The "Featured" carousel is a consistently present location to find SVOD content))
AND an authentication error occurs (This can be simulated by blocking calls to https://falcon.mlbinfra.com:443/svod?*)
custom_expected: THEN messaging is shown to the user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN starting non-live VOD content
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN start from the beginning

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN resuming VOD content from the app being backgrounded
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the content should resume from the point the user was previously watching from

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN resume any time of VOD content that the user previously watched
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN resume from where they were watching

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user finishes any type of VOD within 10s of the end of the video
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the next time they play the video, it should start at the beginning
